```{r load-pkg, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library (repometrics)
```
This page includes several graphs providing insight into the models of
community health across the entire organization(s).

```{r load-data}
dat_models <- readRDS ("results-org.Rds") |>
    as.data.frame ()
```
```{r ojs-in-models, echo = FALSE}
ojs_define (models_in = dat_models)
```
```{ojs}
models = {
    return transpose(models_in).map(row => ({
        ...row,
        date: new Date(row.date)
    }));
}
models_len = models.length
```


```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
    height: 20 * models_len,
    marginLeft: 60,
    marginTop: 50,
    marginBottom: 50,
    y: {grid: true},
    marks: [
        Plot.barX(
            models,
            {
                y: "package",
                x: "final",
                sort: {y: "-x" },
                stroke: "gray",
                fill: "final",
                strokeWidth: 2,
            }
        ),
    ],
    color: {
        scheme: "Cool",
        type: "ordinal"
    }
})
```
